name: Kenahrens.GitHub.io
body:
### Home of the...
I'm proud to be a husband, father, godfather, uncle, brother, son, and occasional developer of ill repute. For work I'm a field Data Nerd at (@newrelic) and like helping people make their websites run faster and error-free.

### Hobbies
Right now I'm testing the waters of NodeJS, I've come to appreciate how JavaScript can be used to fire off lots of API requests in parallel for automated tasks. Core Java is almost a second language, I started with Java 1.2 in the late 90s. At home I run ubuntu (or lubuntu on the under-powered machines).
note: Don't delete this file! It's used internally to help with page regeneration.
